Body:
log2_space_mean = 0.0
log2_space_std = 2.0
hd = LogNormal(log2_space_mean, log2_space_std)
samples = get_many_samples_for(hd)
samples_median = np.median(samples)
assert 0.9 < samples_median < 1.1
samples_std = np.std(samples)
assert 5 < samples_std < 8
assert hd.pdf(0.0) == 0.0
assert abs(hd.pdf(1.0) - 0.28777602476804065) < 1e-06
assert abs(hd.pdf(5.0) - 0.029336304593386688) < 1e-06
assert hd.cdf(0.0) == 0.0
assert hd.cdf(1.0) == 0.5
assert abs(hd.cdf(5.0) - 0.8771717397015799) < 1e-06
assert hd.min() == 0
assert hd.max() == np.inf
assert abs(hd.mean() - 2.614063815405198) < 1e-06
assert abs(hd.var() - 39.86106421503915) < 1e-06
assert abs(hd.std() - 6.313561927710787) < 1e-06
assert abs(hd.mean() - np.mean(samples)) < 0.1
assert abs((hd.var() - np.var(samples)) / hd.var()) < 0.25
